metadata.name: Artiffine Philanthropist
metadata.description:
The special 12th character of The Divergents NFT collection is designed for businesses, organizations, and communities that have decided to join The Divergents in developing an altruistic mindset towards the world and contribute their time, talent, or treasure. The Philanthropist is always tailored to each entity according to its brand colors and mission. In collaboration with Divergents, Artiffine is developing technological solutions to offer new utilities to our NFT holders. 

The Philanthropist is a convenient medium for a wide range of companies to establish innovative CSR programs and an introduction to the world of NFT and Web3. The NFT itself can be used as a profile picture on social media or as a symbol indicating the companyâ€™s dedication to altruism.
